segments.text: I see a young boy climbing on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching up into an open cabinet where a cookie jar sits.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The jar is clearly labeled 'COOKIE JAR' and it's full of delicious treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He has one hand in the jar, grabbing cookies, and the other holds a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like he's trying to catch them or use the plate as a cover.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Beside him, a little girl is reaching up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so eager for her share of the spoils, it's quite charming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are definitely working together on this secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks very wobbly; its legs are splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope it doesn't tip over with him on it, that would be terrible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mother is completely unaware of their little adventure, it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper unfolding before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on getting those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The temptation must be irresistible for them, bless their hearts.
segments.speaker: PAR
